name: EKU Adult Education Center - Madison County Adult Education
description: Madison County Adult Education, located at Eastern Kentucky University, is part of the Kentucky Adult Education (KYAE) system. They offer comprehensive educational, training and career resources including GED education and testing, associate degrees, and skills training. The program helps adults earn their GED credentials, obtain certifications, and pursue associate degrees to prepare for higher-paying jobs and more rewarding careers. Services are free and available to Kentucky residents.
source: Verified from Kentucky Adult Education website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Monday: 8:30 AM - 8:00 PM, Tuesday: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM, Wednesday: 8:30 AM - 8:00 PM, Thursday: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM, Friday: 8:30 AM - 12:00 PM, Saturday-Sunday: Closed
notes: This is the Madison County location of Kentucky Adult Education, operated through Eastern Kentucky University. The program offers free GED classes and testing, as well as pathways to associate degrees and career certifications. They work with the Kentucky Office of Adult Education to provide academic and essential skills instruction.
